about_the_game:
A collection of 25 songs with rhythmic electronic elements that match the character of each enemy in the game.
The interplay of near-future and ethereal themes brings out the mood and atmosphere of each story scene with their different styles.

Through the Last Command Soundtrack, you will once again experience the program world you stepped into and re-experience the thrilling battles and adventures of the game.


Includes:
- A total of 25 original music tracks from the game
- Both MP3 and FLAC music formats
